message.content: {"given_definition_quality":85,"better_definition":"you (referring to the person being spoken to)","sentence":"你在家。","image_prompt":"A simple soft apocalypse animation style image of a person pointing to another person inside a house, clearly showing a sense of 'you' as the one being talked to.
